duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with top-performing leads provided by the company and reach out to prospective customers via various communication channels.
Represent the company positively in the market and network to create additional loan opportunities.
Generate new and repeat sales by providing product information, outstanding customer service, and educating customers about product features and benefits.

Interview prospective borrowers to analyze financial and credit data to determine customer’s financing objectives and present price, credit, and terms in accordance with company standards and regulatory requirements.

education_certification.credential: MLO state license under the National Mortgage Licensing System (NMLS) and Registry
